text: (Avarkalitam nampikkai illaiye enru napiye!) Nir accariyappatuvirayin avarkal, "niccayamaka nankal (marittu) mannakivitta piraku nam putitaka pataikkappatuvoma?" Enru kuruvatu (itaivita) accariyamanate! Ivarkal tam tankalutaiya iraivanaiye nirakarippavarkal (akave, marumaiyil) ivarkalutaiya kaluttukalil vilankitappatum; ivarkal narakavacikale yavarkal; ivarkal atil enrenrum irupparkal
